info.title: Nikita Presnykov will speak at a concert in Los Angeles.
info.short_text: The grandson of Alla Pugachevo, who left Russia, on his page at the social media, invited the participants to the " Night of Huts Zero " concert, to be held in Los Angeles on 8 March.

info.title: The Gogen of the Sun became a father, but he won't admit who the mother of his child.
info.short_text: After a large divorce with Ekaterina Tereskovic, the Gogen Sunmen almost stopped talking to the press and never even appeared in their social media. And recently, a 43-year-old showman published a picture with a baby and ambiguously pointed out that he finally became a father.

info.title: The Russians have begun to issue forms to participate in the quictorine elections.
info.short_text: The Russians at work began to issue victorine forms for the presidential election from 15 to 17 March. Organizers are announcing the possibility of buying an apartment, a car or a smartphone.

info.title: Zagar and smoking lead to extinction of skin
info.short_text: Scientists from Canada, after research, have concluded that accelerated leather ageing leads to simultaneous effects of sunlight and smoking.

info.title: From 1 March, the pension will increase for those who reached 80 in February
info.short_text: Overall, the pension will increase by almost 7.5 per cent this year.

info.title: There is a shortage of measles vaccines in Russian regions
